name: runSync
signature: { <A, E, R>(runtime: Runtime<R>, effect: Effect<A, E, R>): A; <R>(runtime: Runtime<R>): <A, E>(effect: Effect<A, E, R>) => A; }
description:
Executes the effect synchronously throwing in case of errors or async boundaries. This method is effectful and should only be invoked at the edges of your
program.
documentation:

This method is effectful and should only be invoked at the edges of your
